description: This is the dynamic sea level, so should have zero global area mean. zos is the effective sea level as if sea ice (and snow) at a grid cell were converted to liquid seawater (Campin et al., 2008). For OMIP, do _not _record inverse barometer responses from sea-ice (and snow) loading in zos. See (Griffies et al, 2016, https://doi.org/10.5194/gmd-9-3231-2016).
cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
